name: Cameras in Plain Sight
description:
Clone of Hidden in Plain Sight, where two players hide from each other, on a playground with cameras.

The Privacy player wins by destructing all cameras.

The Security player wins by filling the space with ten cameras.

Both players can also win by finding and attacking the other player's character.

Submission for the Weekly Hour Game Jam W4 2017.

I'm sad that this game does not get any polish, but surely it's already fun as it is.

For next time:

  1. Abstract shapes are efficient.
  2. BFXR is efficient
